summary: Four dogged door-to-door Bible salesmen travel from Boston to Florida on a seemingly futile quest to sell luxury editions of the Good Book to working-class Catholics.
cast: Paul Brennan|Charles McDevitt|James Baker|Raymond Martos|Kennie Turner|Melbourne I. Feltman|Margaret McCarron
keywords: national film registry|living out of a suitcase|bible|catholic|door to door
director: Directors: Albert Maysles, David Maysles | 1 more credit Â»
title: Salesman
